results.name: Number of solutions to a^2 + b^2 + 5*c^2 = n.
comment: a(n) = 0 for n of the form 4^i*(8*j+3), A055046. [_Zak Seidov_, May 12 2010]
link: Zak Seidov, Table of n,a(n) for n=0..1000
formula: G.f.: theta_3(q)^2*theta_3(q^5), where theta_3() is the Jacobi theta function. - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Aug 01 2018
